title: Open Source vs Proprietary Software
description: Interactive infographic comparing open source and proprietary software licensing models with hover tooltips and interactive elements
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Software Licensing
Open Source
Linux
Computer Science
learningObjectives: Define open source and proprietary software
Identify examples of open source and proprietary software
Compare the rights users have with each licensing model
Evaluate the pros and cons of each approach
